title: East Knox-Elgin football preview
text:
1 CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
East Knox Bulldogs vs. Elgin Comets 
Where: Elgin High School 
Records: East Knox 0-8 overall, 0-5 Mid Ohio Athletic Conference; Elgin 2-6 overall, 0-5 MOAC 
Last year: Elgin won 28-26 
Last week: East Knox lost to Cardington-Lincoln 54-8; Elgin lost to Centerburg 56-6 
Keys for Elgin 
Good chance for Comets to break out of big slump. 
Another big game from leading rusher Zach Murdock, who leads Elgin with 550 yards on the ground. 
More production from the passing game, and an improved effort on defense. 
Keys for East Knox 
Good chance for Bulldogs to break out of big slump. 
More good things out of the ground game from RB Zach Hill, a 600-yard rusher so far this fall. 
Better defensive work. Bulldogs are allowing right about 400 yards of total offense per contest.
